BaseDatabase

Base Database implementation that is suggested that other DBD’s inherit from.  This defines a few functions that are DBD independent such as Database.queryFetchOne and Database.queryFetchAll.  For all other functions a DBIException is thrown with the message content “Not impemented.”

New DBD classes should inherit from BaseDatabase not directly from the Database interface.

See Also

Functions
getKeywords
Takes a string and returns keywords and their values in a character array.
